alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Carroll; Hancock; Henderson; Henry; Jo Daviess; McDonough; Mercer; Putnam; Rock Island; Stephenson; Warren; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 08 at 2:57PM CST until January 10 at 6:00AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 12 inches. The lower amounts will occur along and east of a line from Macomb Illinois, to Princeton Illinois. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph Tuesday afternoon through Tuesday night leading to considerable blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Portions of north central, northwest and west central Illinois and east central, northeast and southeast Iowa. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact this evening`s commute, and more likely the commutes Tuesday into Wednesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A long duration snow event with two to three periods of heavy snow is expected. Amounts up to a foot of snow are likely.The lower amounts will occur along and east of a line from Macomb Illinois, to Princeton Illinois.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
